sentence.value: Samantha Cristoforetti (born April 26, 1977 in Milan, Italy) is the third woman astronaut in the European Space Agency, and the first Italian woman astronaut.
sentence.annotated-sentence: [[Samantha Cristoforetti|Samantha_Cristoforetti]] (born April 26, 1977 in [[Milan , Italy|Milan]] is the third [[woman|Woman]] [[astronaut|Astronaut]] in [[the European Space Agency|European_Space_Agency]], and the first Italian [[woman|Woman]] [[astronaut|Astronaut]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Samantha Cristoforetti|Samantha_Cristoforetti]] (born April 26, 1977 in Milan, Italy) is the third woman [[astronaut|Astronaut]] in the European Space Agency, and the first Italian woman [[astronaut|Astronaut]].

sentence.value: She is scheduled to be a part of Expedition 42/43 aboard the International Space Station.
sentence.annotated-sentence: She is scheduled to be a part of [[Expedition|Exploration]] 42/43 aboard [[the International Space Station|International_Space_Station]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: She is scheduled to be a part of Expedition 42/43 aboard the International Space Station.

sentence.value: Cristoforetti was born in Milan in 1977.
She spent her childhood in Malè, in Val di Sole, Trentino, Italy.
sentence.annotated-sentence: She spent [[her childhood|Childhood]] in Malè, in Val di Sole, Trentino, Italy.
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: She spent her childhood in Malè, in Val di Sole, Trentino, Italy.

sentence.value: She studied in Bolzano and Trento and graduated from the Technical University of Munich with a degree in Mechanical Engineering.
sentence.annotated-sentence: She studied in Bolzano and Trento and graduated from [[the Technical University of Munich|Technical_University_Munich]] with a degree in [[Mechanical Engineering|Mechanical_engineering]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: She studied in Bolzano and Trento and graduated from the Technical University of Munich with a degree in Mechanical Engineering.

sentence.value: She studied at the École nationale supérieure de l'aéronautique et de l'espace in Toulouse, France, and at the Mendeleev Russian University of Chemistry and Technology in Moscow, Russia.

sentence.value: She also graduated in Aeronautics Sciences at the Italian Accademia Aeronautica in Pozzuoli, becoming one of the first women to be a lieutenant and fighter pilot in the Italian Air Force.

sentence.value: On July 3, 2012, the European Space Agency announced that Samantha Cristoforetti is set for a long-duration mission to the ISS in 2014.
sentence.annotated-sentence: On [[July|2014]] 3, 2012, [[the European Space Agency|European_Space_Agency]] announced that [[Samantha Cristoforetti|Samantha_Cristoforetti]] is set for a long-duration mission to [[the ISS|S]] in [[2014|2014]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: On July 3, 2012, the European Space Agency announced that Samantha Cristoforetti is set for a long-duration mission to the ISS in 2014.
